txt.en: The Protectors of the Pristine Glade need your help defending the Glade from invaders.

'Stop! No one is allowed through here.

'You want to be allowed entrance here? I do not care if the Elders themselves... 

'They did? 

'Nevertheless, you need to prove yourself to me. I am the Keeper of the Cave. Before you enter, you must clear the land of the foul monsters. Return when you are done, and you may safely pass.'

River-turtles and dun-crows roam the lands outside the cave to the Pristine Glade.\n\nWin has asked you to defeat foul monsters outside the cave entrance to the Pristine Glade to earn his trust. The only monsters, however, are river-turtles and dun-crows.
'Well done. You have completed the Task of the Keeper. You may pass.'
Win is at the entrance to the Pristine Glade.\n\nYou should return to Win at the cave entrance and tell him the deed is done.
'Defeat the turtles and crebain, and I may permit you entrance to the Glade.'
Talk to Win at the entrance to the Pristine Glade
If It is not Too Much Trouble
